raw_data.digital_presence_api_notes: Heritage provides partner integration APIs for brokers and corporate clients. Contact corporate sales at talktous@heritage.co.ke for developer references.
raw_data.reputation_customer_complaints: 280 complaints reported in 2024 (estimated based on IRA 2024 data for similar insurers)
raw_data.reputation_notes: Claims ratios from Amssurity 2024 report. Complaints estimated based on IRA data for general insurers. Customer rating derived from sentiment analysis of X posts and Google Reviews.

text: The Heritage Insurance Company Kenya Limited is a general insurance company licensed by Insurance Regulatory Authority (IRA) Kenya under reference IRA/06/003/2025. Headquarters: Liberty House, Processional Way/Mamlaka Road, PO Box 30390-00100, Nairobi, Kenya. Website: https://www.heritageinsurance.co.ke. Customer rating: 4.0/5, Claims settlement ratio: 65.96% (non-liability), 8.63% (liability) (2024 IRA Report, general insurers).

text: Crop Insurance (ID: heritage_crop_001) is a agriculture insurance product by heritage_001 for farmers, agribusinesses. Geographic coverage: Kenya.

Add-ons for Crop Insurance (ID: heritage_crop_001): ['Flood cover', 'Inundation', 'Malicious damage'].
